title: Image Enhancement using Multi-Histogram Equalization
shortDescription: Advanced image enhancement system using spatial-constrained clustering in HSV color space
fullDescription: Developed a novel image enhancement approach combining multi-histogram equalization with spatial-constrained clustering algorithms (K-Means, FCM, GMM, HDBSCAN) in HSV color space. The system achieves superior contrast enhancement while preserving natural color appearance and avoiding over-enhancement artifacts. Validated on multiple benchmark datasets including KODAK, UCMERCED, and medical imaging collections.
highlights: Achieved SSIM score of 0.924 across benchmark datasets
Outperformed baseline methods by 15% in contrast enhancement
Published research paper with journal-backed methodology
Implemented 4 different clustering algorithms for comparison

title: Robust Deep Steganography with AttenHideNet
shortDescription: Adversarial training-enhanced deep steganography for robust image concealment
fullDescription: Fine-tuned AttenHideNet architecture with adversarial training to improve robustness against steganalysis attacks. Implemented attention mechanisms for better information hiding while maintaining high visual quality. Tested on CelebA and COCO datasets with various attack scenarios including JPEG compression, Gaussian noise, and geometric transformations.
highlights: Improved robustness by 28% against steganalysis attacks
Maintained PSNR >40dB with high capacity data hiding
Implemented mixed precision training for 2x speedup
Robust against JPEG compression and noise attacks

title: Batch Scheduling Optimization using PSO
shortDescription: Particle Swarm Optimization for delivery batch scheduling and route optimization
fullDescription: Developed an intelligent batch scheduling system using Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) algorithm to optimize delivery routes and batch assignments. The system considers multiple constraints including time windows, vehicle capacity, and delivery priorities to minimize total delivery time and cost.
highlights: Reduced delivery time by 23% compared to traditional methods
Optimized batch sizes for 100+ daily deliveries
Real-time route recalculation under dynamic constraints
Scalable solution tested on datasets up to 1000 delivery points

title: Personal Portfolio Website
shortDescription: Modern portfolio website with Token Terminal-inspired UI using Next.js and Shadcn
fullDescription: Built a modern, responsive portfolio website using Next.js 16, Shadcn UI, and Framer Motion. Features smooth animations, dark/light theme toggle, and JSON-driven content management for easy updates. Designed with Token Terminal and Arkham Intelligence aesthetics in mind.
highlights: Fully responsive design with smooth animations
Deployed on Vercel with CI/CD pipeline
